body:
Going to be recording more avicus videos, here lies my video hub. 

Note: I do record / render in 1080p so It does take time for the quality to become good so wait at least a few minutes if you'd like to see the videos in high quality. FEEDBACK IS APPRECIATED.

Avicus Scrimmages:

- Cacalmarin vs PROXY: https://youtu.be/7Oyqm8W7eho


Avicus Gameplays:

- Episode #1 ft: Colecrc: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B2-0G4UnUa0 (Video is 9 months old so my mic is A LOT louder :c.)

Avicus Montages:
